article_title: We're Still at War: Photo of the Day for December 3, 2013
article_text: 1st Sgt. William Huston and Staff Sgt. Ronald Barker, paratroopers with Troop C, 2nd Squadron, 38th Calvary Regiment's Long Range Surveillance, wait to reach altitude so they can jump static line with the new RA-1 parachute system at Fort Hood's Rapido Drop Zone, Nov. 19. U.S. Army photo by Sgt. Cody Barber, 11th Public Affairs Detachment.
